[Home](./index.md) &gt; [bge-core](./bge-core.md) &gt; [IGameConfig](./bge-core.igameconfig.md)

## IGameConfig interface

Your game should default export this interface, describing how to configure and play your game.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IGameConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [apiVersion](./bge-core.igameconfig.apiversion.md) |  | number | Describes which version of the BGE API your game was built with. This should be set to API\_VERSION in bge-core. |
|  [Game](./bge-core.igameconfig.game.md) |  | new () =&gt; [IGame](./bge-core.igame.md) | Constructor for your custom game class. Your game must have a parameterless constructor. |
|  [maxPlayers](./bge-core.igameconfig.maxplayers.md) |  | number | Maximum number of players your game supports. |
|  [minPlayers](./bge-core.igameconfig.minplayers.md) |  | number | Minimum number of players your game supports. |
